ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] guise tips
ygData.msgSnippet: What is the the placeholder?  My 6 hour camp was pretty much filled with nonstop combat and the assasin was the first named mob we saw.  Several members of the
ygData.messageBody:
What is the the placeholder? My 6 hour camp was
pretty much filled with nonstop combat and the assasin
was the first named mob we saw. Several members of
the group who camp the dead side said that was pretty
unusual.

For those looking for a mask, I recommend the dead
side highly. dying 4 times, one run, one revive and
two rezes, I still ended up with a quarter buble of xp
for the night, a fair amount of plat and all the FS I
could carry.

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
(Not unsubbing til the end of the day)


--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
<garramone@...> wrote:
> his placeholder popped every 29 minutes for you,
> just not him. grats on the
> mask =)
>
> Shada Iceheart, L57 Wood Elf Bard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> > Mine was a 6 hour camp. Maximumeq lists the spawn
> time
> > of the assasin at 29 minutes (in the comments
> > section). But that is incorrect (and my wife is
> very
> > pissed off at me this morning for all the time I
> spent
> > camping that thing...) Point here is, have a pot
> of
> > coffee on, you may be luckier than me, but the
> assasin
> > is a rare spawn.
>
